class DCN[source]

DCN(in_channels, out_channels, kernel_size, stride, padding, dilation=1, deformable_groups=1) :: Module

A Deformable Convolutional Kernel

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
body = create_body(resnet34, 2)[0:6]
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
class Net(Module):
    def __init__(self, arch=resnet34, n_in=1, n_out=2):
        self.body = create_body(arch, n_in)[0:6]
        self.head = nn.Sequential(DCN(128, 256, (5,5), 1, 2),
                                  DCN(256,256,(3,3), 2, 1))
    def forward(self, x):
        return self.head(self.body(x))
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
m = Net().cuda()
